about_the_game:
Counter-Terrorism Ops is a tactical action game in which the player takes on the role of a counter-terrorism unit. Make decisions, take down terrorists and save hostages!

A good audiovisual setting, combined with interesting game mechanics, allows players to experience highly immersive production! Welcome to Counter-Terrorism Ops!

Choose the right equipment for a given action, make tactical decisions for the entire group, and shoot from the perspective of one of them!

Features:
  • great audiovisual
  • playas counter-terrorist
  • save hostages
  • make a decision that affects your game
  • choose the right equipment & tools

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card with latest drivers

short_description: Check if you can free all hostages without incurring losses among the members of the anti-terrorist group. Choose the right equipment for a given action, make tactical decisions for the entire group, and shoot from the perspective of one of them!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
